description.translate: Behind beauty often lies an occult power.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Emeraude de force\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Derrière la beauté se cache\"}","{\"text\":\"§7souvent un pouvoir occulte.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Behind beauty often\"}","{\"text\":\"§7lies an occult power.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7SPD§a1 §7LUC§c-1\"}"]}}
